title: sudden depletion of disk space
body:
**Description**
typical auto-pruning worked like a charm, no issues at all but couple days ago during the last full pruning all disk space was consumed, please see attached screenshot

do I undrstand corretly only way to recover is to resync all from scratch?

what needed to be done to ensure avoiding such issues in the future?
